attributes.action: The United Kingdom to stand firm against Israeli blockade in Gaza.
attributes.additional_details:
Israel has set a blockade in Gaza for years. Stopping poor families starving for food getting aid. Stopping a innocent little girl who has been shot in a crossfire between the Israeli army from getting the treatment she needs. Stopping a poor family getting the rescourses to rebuild their home as the Israel army bombed there house, but saying it was a "mistake".
The people there need our help to survive.
Don't be just passing through this, Sign it and make a difference.
